title: Beacon
description: Beacon, a wireless device that communicates identity information to mobile applications as mobile devices come within range.

xdm:proximityUUID.title: Proximity UUID
xdm:proximityUUID.description: The UUID configured into a beacon (or multiple beacons if multiple operate in an area) to be transmited to mobile devices in range to identify an orginizations beacons.

xdm:beaconMajor.title: Beacon Major
xdm:beaconMajor.description: The first sub orginization identifier of an area multiple beacon operate in.

xdm:beaconMinor.title: Beacon Minor
xdm:beaconMinor.description: The second sub orginization identifier of an area multiple beacon operate in. The smallest area a beacon can refine location to.
